mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET goal=#{goal} where answer_id=#{answerId};
UPDATE ANSWER SET answer_content=#{answerContent} WHERE answer_id=#{answerId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM answer a WHERE a.examination_id=#{examId} AND a.user_id=#{userId};

SELECT e.examination_id, e.examination_question, e.examination_score, e.reference_answer, a.answer_id, a.answer_content, a.goal FROM examination e LEFT JOIN answer a ON e.examination_id = a.examination_id WHERE a.user_id=#{userId};
